Supporting Independent Living

Compassionate Home Care in Lithonia, GA

HIS GRACE HOME CARE LLC delivers dependable, heart-led home care services in Lithonia, GA, right where your loved ones feel safest and most comfortable at home.
Contact Us

Tailored Daily Support

What We Do to Make Daily Life Easier

We offer in-home support that meets emotional, physical, and practical needs, ensuring seniors stay safe, independent, and confident in their daily routines.

Companionship Care

Our warm, reliable social visits bring joy and mental wellness to everyday life. Companionship reduces isolation and encourages meaningful interaction for older adults who live alone or spend long hours without engagement.
Learn More

Personal Assistance

Need help with hygiene, dressing, or mobility? Our trained personal care aides ensure safety, dignity, and daily comfort for every client, offering support with sensitive tasks like toileting, bathing, and grooming respectfully.
Learn More

Transportation Services

From errands to appointments, we provide dependable, door-to-door transport solutions available privately or through Medicaid-approved programs. Whether it’s a pharmacy trip, clinic visit, or grocery run, we make every journey safe and stress-free.
Learn More

Call Us Today

(678) 362-3094
(404) 644-4127

Faith-Based Approach

Meet the Heart Behind Our Work

We are more than caregivers; we are trusted partners in your care journey. Based in Lithonia, GA, our team delivers values-driven service with compassion, integrity, and skill. Every home we serve receives attentive support built on faith, trust, and decades of experience.
  • Locally Owned & Operated – We understand the needs of Lithonia families because we live here too.
  • Faith-Guided Approach – Our caregiving philosophy is rooted in service, love, and dignity.
  • Fully Screened Caregivers – Every team member is background-checked and trained for excellence.

Homes Supported with Heart
Learn More About Us

Trust. Respect. Excellence.

Care with Accountability and Heart

We offer flexible in-home services that adapt to your needs. From companion support to live-in care, we’re here when it matters most.

Customized Plans

Your care is built around your daily routine, preferences, and health goals.

Dependable Availability

We respond quickly, show up on time, and adjust as your needs change.

Genuine Relationships

We care for each client like family, with empathy, dignity, and consistency.

Voices That Matter

Praise from Families in Lithonia

Local families praise our reliability, kindness, and responsiveness. Many refer friends or return to us as their loved ones’ needs evolve.

Answers You Need

Your Top Home Care Questions (FAQs)

We’ve compiled the most common questions asked by families seeking reliable home care in Lithonia and surrounding areas.
Contact Us
How do I know which type of home care my loved one needs?
We start with a simple consultation to learn about your loved one’s condition, daily habits, and long-term care goals. Then we build a personalized care plan that matches their needs, lifestyle, and family preferences, whether they need companionship or full-time assistance.
Are your caregivers qualified, trained, and background-checked?
Yes. Every caregiver at HIS GRACE HOME CARE LLC is carefully screened through background checks and hands-on interviews. They are also certified or trained according to state requirements and regularly evaluated for performance, safety, and professionalism.
Can we change or adjust care hours later on?
Absolutely. We understand that care needs evolve. Whether it’s adding overnight support, adjusting weekly hours, or switching to live-in care, our flexible scheduling makes it easy to update services with a simple call, no penalty or delay.
Do you accept Medicaid for transportation in Lithonia?
Yes, we do. We offer private-pay rides and Medicaid-funded transportation services. If your loved one qualifies under Georgia’s Medicaid program, we’ll help guide you through eligibility paperwork and all the coordination required for approved non-emergency trips.

Let’s Talk Care

Contact Our Care Team Today

Ready to explore trusted, compassionate home care in Lithonia, GA? Call HIS GRACE HOME CARE LLC today at (678) 362-3094. We’re here for your family, every step of the way.
